  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2399</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection and refraction of light at a water surface</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion und Brechung des Lichtes an einer 
Wasseroberfläche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion et réfraction de lumière sur une 
surface de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão e refraction da luz em uma superfície 
da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione e rifrazione di luce ad una superficie
dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση και διάθλαση του φωτός σε μια επιφάνεια 
ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión y refracción de la luz en una 
superficie del agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which illustrates the reflection and refraction of light rays which hit a water surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Reflexion und die Brechung
der hellen Strahlen veranschaulicht, die eine Wasseroberfläche 
schlagen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui illustre la réflexion et la 
réfraction des rayons légers qui frappent une surface de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que ilustre a reflexão e o 
refraction dos raios claros que batem uma superfície da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che illustra la riflessione e la 
rifrazione dei raggi luminosi che colpiscono una superficie 
dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που επεξηγεί την αντανάκλαση και τη 
διάθλαση των ελαφριών ακτίνων που χτυπούν μια επιφάνεια ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que ilustra la reflexión y la 
refracción de los rayos ligeros que golpean una superficie del agua.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
